description: NEW VERSION - Now with 5 groups of 10 emails addresses plus easily select an email address where a contact has multiple email addresses.  Want to email your workgroup, friends or family effortlessly?  Tired of continually picking out names from the contact list.    GroupE is a fast, easy to use way to send group emails.  Save up to 5 different lists of up to 10 email addresses each.  Combine the lists automatically to send 50 emails at one time.  Name your lists, enter email addresses on the fly, even if they are not in your contact list.  A real time saver.  Easier to use than any other group emailing method available.
